title: Is Toilet-bound Hanako-kun appropriate for a 12 year old? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definitely! Tbhk is very light-hearted but has a darker story to it. Many moments are very sweet and could make anyone fangirl in a heartbeat. As much as it has those aspects though, some scenes tend to hit a different place. I wouldn’t say its gore or horror or anything like that. Just know some parts of the anime will the some-what darker. Besides that, I definitely recommend you watch it!
